name: Grim Dawn
summary: Grim Dawn is a PC action role-playing game set in a thematically-dark fictional world. The game was developed using a heavily upgraded version of the engine used to create Titan Quest. We have built upon past success by dramatically improving the feel of combat and creating a richer, less linear world and story, while improving upon the loot and skill systems that made TQ great.
